title: One Pot Greek Chicken and Rice
steps: Combine chicken and marinade: lemon zest, lemon juice, garlic, 1 T oregano, 0.5 t salt. Set aside for 20 minutes.
In a large iron skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat.
Remove chicken from marinade. Set marinade aside.
Brown the chicken in the skillet, both sides. Set aside.
Saut√© onion in the skillet over medium heat, until translucent.
In the skillet, add the marinade, rice, broth, water, 1 T oregano, 0.5 t salt, and pepper.
Bring the mixture to a simmer for 30 seconds.
Add chicken, cover, and bake for 35 minutes. Uncover, and bake 10 minutes more.
